class.name: VisualShaderNodeTexture3D
class.brief_description: Performs a 3D texture lookup within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Performs a lookup operation on the provided texture, with support for multiple texture sources to choose from.

members.member: A source texture. Used if [member VisualShaderNodeSample3D.source] is set to [constant VisualShaderNodeSample3D.SOURCE_TEXTURE].
